alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 01 at 10:04AM AKDT until September 02 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach may wash away. Debris may wash up onto the beach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph will continue into late tonight. The highest surf and worst conditions will along northwest facing shores such as near Deering. Winds and surf will decrease early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
